favourite.article: Bright as crystal! Reaching all man, the love of God! Hallelujah!
The love of God be with you all!
The love of Christ be with you all!
Last week I had the Summer School of Truth about the Triune God and the Person and Work of Christ. This song really touched me. Amen!
This song came to my heart yesterday. It is so lovely. The joy of Christ that flows through Howard Higashi's songs always ministers to me.
Thank You Lord for Your love and grace!
Amen! The Triune God be with you all!!
aleluya por este himno es vivificante para mi vida
Amen! We should always be with the Lord!!

Amen! The Lord always finds a way to reach us with His life! Instead of "goodbye" in many letters shown in the Bible, "the love of God and the grace of Christ and fellowship of the Holy Spirit be with you all" is written instead. This is the way! Jesus es el Senor!
From the throne of our God flows a refreshing river that satisfies and reaches man! Praise the Triune God!

The divine dispensing of the divine Trinity is so rich!!! We only need to open our whole being for His infilling. If we turn our hearts to Him, the river of water of life will surely fill us. The Triune God is so rich, enjoyable, and refreshing!!!
O Lord Jesus! Praise the Three in one! Flow flow flow in me, in every part in me! Being with You, being with every brother and sister flowing forever!
Amen! Praise the Lord! And grace be multiplied to those who serve Him in incorruptibility! Amen! He who is joined to the Lord is one spirit!! Hallelujah!
I love this song by Howard Higashi. The love of God and the grace of Christ be with you all saints.
Praise the Lord!!!! I'm a crazy lover of Jesus, He is sufficient for us. He does all things for us. He is all-inclusive.

Praise the Lord we have the threefold blessing and this threefold blessing involves the Triune God! 2 Cor. 13:14 is not a benediction but a transmission. Love is the source, the fountain; grace is the course, the spring; and the fellowship is the river, the flow.We have the Triune God as our enjoyment!
Hallelujah!!! This is not a creed!!! This is the Triune God mingled with the tripatite man. What an awesome song!!! Amen!!

What a blessing that our Triune God convey to us as portray in this lovely and marvelous hymn by our Bro. Howard . We can actually enjoy and experience such a threefold blessing in our daily life,by drinking Him as the living water flowing from within us as we give him the preeminance to have the first place in us, praise the Lord, by this, He enthrone in us, and the water of life flow from the throne to every part of our being, quench our thirst, satisfy us. What a blessing it really is.
Just as the river of life, this song makes me feel refreshed. I can sing it all day.
I enjoy the Lord in the morning with this song. The Spirit will move you to tears out of the sheer enjoyment and love for our Triune God.
